projects.text: After Lexington High School changed their schedule to a more confusing 6-day rotation, I made [Blocks](https://blocks.elk.sh), a progressive web app that more than 1,100 students and teachers use to check their schedules.
While procrastinating my homework, I made [Progress](https://progress.elk.sh) to see how much of the school year we had made it through.
In the process of studying for the AP Biology test, I wrote a [study guide](https://bio.elk.sh) of questions.
